original_text: “You shall not do according to all that we are doing here today, everyone doing whatever is right in his own eyes,
korean_text: 우리가 오늘 여기에서는 각기 소견대로 하였거니와 너희가 거기에서는 그렇게 하지 말지니라

sentences.original_text: according to all that we are doing here today,
sentences.korean_translation: 오늘 우리가 여기서 행하는 모든 것을 따라

sentences.original_text: everyone doing whatever is right in his own eyes,
sentences.korean_translation: 각각 자기 눈에 옳은 대로 행하는 것처럼
